item.title: How trashy is your period?
item.author: Petchara Newson,
item.description: Since the 5p carrier bag charge, the thought of throwing away a perfectly good plastic bag is enough to make most of us cringe. Now imagine unknowingly throwing away 80 plastic bags every month. That’s how much plastic the average woman uses over her period if she throws away 20 disposables a month! …
